Plot: A family determined to get their young daughter into the finals of a beauty pageant take a cross-country trip in their VW bus.
Title: Little Miss Sunshine
Actors: Abigail Breslin, Greg Kinnear, Paul Dano, Alan Arkin
tomatoConsensus: Little Miss Sunshine succeeds thanks to a strong ensemble cast that includes Greg Kinnear, Steve Carell, Toni Collette, Alan Arkin, and Abigail Breslin, as well as a delightfully funny script.
